00021 UINT32      guiNumTileCacheStructs = 0;
00022 UINT32 guiMaxTileCacheSize          = 50;
00023 UINT32 guiCurTileCacheSize          = 0;
00024 INT32  giDefaultStructIndex   = -1;
00025 
00026 TILE_CACHE_ELEMENT            *gpTileCache = NULL;
00027 TILE_CACHE_STRUCT             *gpTileCacheStructInfo = NULL;

00031 BOOLEAN InitTileCache(  )
00032 {     
00033       UINT32                        cnt;
00034       GETFILESTRUCT FileInfo;
00035       INT16                         sFiles = 0;
00036 
00037       gpTileCache = (TILE_CACHE_ELEMENT *)MemAlloc( sizeof( TILE_CACHE_ELEMENT ) * guiMaxTileCacheSize );
00038 
00039       // Zero entries
00040       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiMaxTileCacheSize; cnt++ )
00041       {
00042             gpTileCache[ cnt ].pImagery = NULL;
00043             gpTileCache[ cnt ].sStructRefID = -1;
00044       }
00045 
00046       guiCurTileCacheSize = 0;
00047 
00048 
00049       // OK, look for JSD files in the tile cache directory and
00050       // load any we find....
00051       if( GetFileFirst("TILECACHE\\*.jsd", &FileInfo) )
00052       {
00053             while( GetFileNext(&FileInfo) )
00054             {
00055                   sFiles++;
00056             }
00057             GetFileClose(&FileInfo);
00058       }
00059 
00060       // Allocate memory...
00061       if ( sFiles > 0 )
00062       {
00063             cnt = 0;
00064 
00065             guiNumTileCacheStructs = sFiles;
00066 
00067             gpTileCacheStructInfo = (TILE_CACHE_STRUCT *)MemAlloc( sizeof( TILE_CACHE_STRUCT ) * sFiles );
00068 
00069             // Loop through and set filenames
00070             if( GetFileFirst("TILECACHE\\*.jsd", &FileInfo) )
00071             {
00072                   while( GetFileNext(&FileInfo) )
00073                   {
00074                         sprintf( gpTileCacheStructInfo[ cnt ].Filename, "TILECACHE\\%s", FileInfo.zFileName );
00075 
00076                         // Get root name
00077                         GetRootName( (INT8 *)gpTileCacheStructInfo[ cnt ].zRootName, (INT8 *)gpTileCacheStructInfo[ cnt ].Filename );
00078 
00079                         // Load struc data....
00080                         gpTileCacheStructInfo[ cnt ].pStructureFileRef = LoadStructureFile( gpTileCacheStructInfo[ cnt ].Filename );
00081 
00082 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00083                         if ( gpTileCacheStructInfo[ cnt ].pStructureFileRef == NULL )
00084                         {
00085                               SET_ERROR(  "Cannot load tilecache JSD: %s", gpTileCacheStructInfo[ cnt ].Filename );           
00086                         }
00087 #endif
00088         if ( _stricmp( gpTileCacheStructInfo[ cnt ].zRootName, "l_dead1" ) == 0 )
00089         {
00090            giDefaultStructIndex = cnt;
00091         }
00092 
00093                         cnt++;
00094                   }
00095                   GetFileClose(&FileInfo);
00096             }
00097       }
00098 
00099       return( TRUE );
00100 }
00101 
00102 void DeleteTileCache( )
00103 {
00104       UINT32 cnt;
00105 
00106       // Allocate entries
00107       if ( gpTileCache != NULL )
00108       {
00109             // Loop through and delete any entries
00110             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiMaxTileCacheSize; cnt++ )
00111             {
00112                   if ( gpTileCache[ cnt ].pImagery != NULL )
00113                   {
00114                         DeleteTileSurface( gpTileCache[ cnt ].pImagery );
00115                   }
00116             }
00117             MemFree( gpTileCache );
00118       }
00119 
00120       if ( gpTileCacheStructInfo != NULL )
00121       {
00122             MemFree( gpTileCacheStructInfo );
00123       }
00124 
00125       guiCurTileCacheSize = 0;
00126 }
00127 
00128 INT16 FindCacheStructDataIndex( INT8 * cFilename )
00129 {
00130       UINT32 cnt;
00131       
00132       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumTileCacheStructs; cnt++ )
00133       {
00134             if ( _stricmp( gpTileCacheStructInfo[ cnt ].zRootName, cFilename ) == 0 )
00135             {
00136                   return(      (INT16)cnt );
00137             }
00138       }
00139 
00140       return( -1 );
00141 }
00142 
00143 INT32 GetCachedTile( INT8 * cFilename )
00144 {
00145       UINT32                  cnt;
00146       UINT32                  ubLowestIndex = 0;
00147       INT16         sMostHits = (INT16)15000;
00148 
00149       // Check to see if surface exists already
00150       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiCurTileCacheSize; cnt++ )
00151       {
00152             if ( gpTileCache[ cnt ].pImagery != NULL )
00153             {
00154                   if ( _stricmp( gpTileCache[ cnt ].zName, cFilename ) == 0 )
00155                   {
00156                          // Found surface, return
00157                          gpTileCache[ cnt ].sHits++;
00158                          return( (INT32)cnt );
00159                   }
00160             }
00161       }
00162 
00163       // Check if max size has been reached
00164       if ( guiCurTileCacheSize == guiMaxTileCacheSize )
00165       {
00166             // cache out least used file
00167             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiCurTileCacheSize; cnt++ )
00168             {
00169                    if ( gpTileCache[ cnt ].sHits < sMostHits )
00170                    {
00171                               sMostHits = gpTileCache[ cnt ].sHits;
00172                               ubLowestIndex = cnt;
00173                    }
00174             }
00175 
00176             // Bump off lowest index
00177             DeleteTileSurface( gpTileCache[ ubLowestIndex ].pImagery );
00178 
00179             // Decrement
00180             gpTileCache[ ubLowestIndex ].sHits = 0;
00181             gpTileCache[ ubLowestIndex ].pImagery = NULL;
00182             gpTileCache[ ubLowestIndex ].sStructRefID = -1;
00183       }
00184 
00185       // If here, Insert at an empty slot
00186       // Find an empty slot
00187       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiMaxTileCacheSize; cnt++ )
00188       {
00189             if ( gpTileCache[ cnt ].pImagery == NULL )
00190             {
00191                   // Insert here
00192                   gpTileCache[ cnt ].pImagery = LoadTileSurface( (char *)cFilename );
00193 
00194                   if ( gpTileCache[ cnt ].pImagery == NULL )
00195                   {
00196                         return( -1 );
00197                   }
00198 
00199                   strcpy( gpTileCache[ cnt ].zName, cFilename );
00200                   gpTileCache[ cnt ].sHits = 1;
00201 
00202                   // Get root name
00203                   GetRootName( (INT8 *)gpTileCache[ cnt ].zRootName, cFilename );
00204 
00205                   gpTileCache[ cnt ].sStructRefID = FindCacheStructDataIndex( (INT8 *)gpTileCache[ cnt ].zRootName );
00206 
00207                   // ATE: Add z-strip info
00208                   if ( gpTileCache[ cnt ].sStructRefID != -1 )
00209                   {
00210                          AddZStripInfoToVObject( gpTileCache[ cnt ].pImagery->vo, gpTileCacheStructInfo[  gpTileCache[ cnt ].sStructRefID ].pStructureFileRef, TRUE, 0 );
00211                   }
00212 
00213                   if ( gpTileCache[ cnt ].pImagery->pAuxData != NULL )
00214                   {
00215                         gpTileCache[ cnt ].ubNumFrames = gpTileCache[ cnt ].pImagery->    pAuxData->ubNumberOfFrames;
00216                   }
00217                   else
00218                   {
00219                         gpTileCache[ cnt ].ubNumFrames = 1;
00220                   }
00221 
00222                   // Has our cache size increased?
00223                   if ( cnt >= guiCurTileCacheSize )
00224                   {
00225                         guiCurTileCacheSize = cnt + 1;;
00226                   }
00227 
00228                   return( cnt );
00229             }
00230       }
00231 
00232       // Can't find one!
00233       return( -1 );
00234 }

00236 
00237 BOOLEAN RemoveCachedTile( INT32 iCachedTile )
00238 {
00239       UINT32                  cnt;
00240 
00241       // Find tile
00242       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiCurTileCacheSize; cnt++ )
00243       {
00244             if ( gpTileCache[ cnt ].pImagery != NULL )
00245             {
00246                   if ( cnt == (UINT32)iCachedTile )
00247                   {
00248                          // Found surface, decrement hits
00249                          gpTileCache[ cnt ].sHits--;
00250 
00251                          // Are we at zero?
00252                          if ( gpTileCache[ cnt ].sHits == 0 )
00253                          {
00254                                     DeleteTileSurface( gpTileCache[ cnt ].pImagery );
00255                                     gpTileCache[ cnt ].pImagery = NULL;
00256                                     gpTileCache[ cnt ].sStructRefID = -1;
00257                                     return( TRUE );;
00258                          }
00259                   }
00260             }
00261       }
00262 
00263       return( FALSE );
00264 }

00267 HVOBJECT GetCachedTileVideoObject( INT32 iIndex )
00268 {
00269       if ( iIndex == -1 )
00270       {
00271             return( NULL );
00272       }
00273 
00274       if ( gpTileCache[ iIndex ].pImagery == NULL )
00275       {
00276             return( NULL );
00277       }
00278 
00279       return( gpTileCache[ iIndex ].pImagery->vo );
00280 }

00283 STRUCTURE_FILE_REF *GetCachedTileStructureRef( INT32 iIndex )
00284 {
00285       if ( iIndex == -1 )
00286       {
00287             return( NULL );
00288       }
00289 
00290       if ( gpTileCache[ iIndex ].sStructRefID == -1 )
00291       {
00292             return( NULL );
00293       }
00294 
00295       return( gpTileCacheStructInfo[ gpTileCache[ iIndex ].sStructRefID ].pStructureFileRef );
00296 }

00299 STRUCTURE_FILE_REF *GetCachedTileStructureRefFromFilename( INT8 *cFilename )
00300 {
00301       INT16 sStructDataIndex;
00302 
00303       // Given filename, look for index
00304       sStructDataIndex = FindCacheStructDataIndex( cFilename );
00305 
00306       if ( sStructDataIndex == -1 )
00307       {
00308             return( NULL );
00309       }
00310 
00311       return( gpTileCacheStructInfo[ sStructDataIndex ].pStructureFileRef );
00312 }

00315 void CheckForAndAddTileCacheStructInfo( LEVELNODE *pNode, INT16 sGridNo, UINT16 usIndex, UINT16 usSubIndex )
00316 { 
00317       STRUCTURE_FILE_REF *pStructureFileRef;
00318 
00319       pStructureFileRef = GetCachedTileStructureRef( usIndex );
00320 
00321       if ( pStructureFileRef != NULL)
00322       {
00323             if ( !AddStructureToWorld( sGridNo, 0, &( pStructureFileRef->pDBStructureRef[ usSubIndex ] ), pNode ) )
00324     {
00325       if ( giDefaultStructIndex != -1 )
00326       {
00327         pStructureFileRef = gpTileCacheStructInfo[ giDefaultStructIndex ].pStructureFileRef;
00328 
00329             if ( pStructureFileRef != NULL)
00330             {
00331                   AddStructureToWorld( sGridNo, 0, &( pStructureFileRef->pDBStructureRef[ usSubIndex ] ), pNode );
00332         }
00333       }
00334     }
00335       }
00336 }
00337 
00338 void CheckForAndDeleteTileCacheStructInfo( LEVELNODE *pNode, UINT16 usIndex )
00339 { 
00340       STRUCTURE_FILE_REF *pStructureFileRef;
00341 
00342       if ( usIndex >= TILE_CACHE_START_INDEX )
00343       {
00344             pStructureFileRef = GetCachedTileStructureRef( ( usIndex - TILE_CACHE_START_INDEX ) );
00345 
00346             if ( pStructureFileRef != NULL)
00347             {
00348                   DeleteStructureFromWorld( pNode->pStructureData );
00349             }
00350       }
00351 }
00352 
00353 void GetRootName( INT8 * pDestStr, INT8 * pSrcStr )
00354 {
00355       // Remove path and extension
00356       INT8        cTempFilename[ 120 ];
00357       STR               cEndOfName;
00358 
00359       // Remove path
00360       strcpy( cTempFilename, pSrcStr );
00361       cEndOfName = strrchr( cTempFilename, '\\' );
00362       if (cEndOfName != NULL)
00363       {
00364             cEndOfName++;
00365             strcpy( pDestStr, cEndOfName );
00366       }
00367       else
00368       {
00369             strcpy( pDestStr, cTempFilename );
00370       }
00371 
00372       // Now remove extension...
00373       cEndOfName = strchr( (char *)pDestStr, '.' );
00374       if (cEndOfName != NULL)
00375       {
00376             *cEndOfName = '\0';
00377       }
00378 
00379 }
